rdf:Description.ns1:label: Paliurus spina-christi
rdf:Description.ns1:abstract: Paliurus spina-christi, commonly known as Jerusalem thorn, garland thorn, Christ's thorn, or crown of thorns, is a species of Paliurus native to the Mediterranean region and southwest and central Asia, from Morocco and Spain east to Iran and Tajikistan.
rdf:Description.ns1:zone: Zona 4 - Sectia Flora si Vegetatia Romaniei
